### PR Checklist
- [ ] Put version number in PR title (e.g. `Release x.y.z - Summary of changes`)
- [ ] Documentation (README, local.env.dist, api.raml, etc.)
- [ ] Tests created or updated
- [ ] Run `make composershow`
- [ ] Run `make psr2`
